src:
Berbatik Hijau, Mendag AS Temui Jokowi di Istana
06 Nov 2019, 10:14 by Hendra Kusuma


Foto: Hendra Kusuma

Jakarta - Menteri Perdagangan Amerika Serikat (AS) Wilbur Ross kini menemui Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) di Istana Merdeka, Jakarta Pusat. Pertemuan berlangsung pada pukul 16.31 WIB.Pantauan detikcom, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019), Wilbur Ross tiba di komplek Istana Kepresidenan Jakarta Selatan pukul 16.20 WIB. Dia didampingi oleh Dubes AS untuk Indonesia Joseph Donovan yang mengenakan baik berkelir merah.Sebelumnya, dalam pertemuan antara Menteri Koordinator Bidang Perekonomian Airlangga Hartarto dengan Wilbur Ross, ada beberapa yang dibahas mengenai urusan Generalized System of Preferences (GSP), investasi, dan hubungan perdagangan Indonesia-AS.GSP adalah sebuah sistem tarif preferensial yang membolehkan satu negara secara resmi memberikan pengecualian terhadap aturan umum Organisasi Perdagangan Dunia (WTO).Namun, pada pertemuan dengan Jokowi belum diketahui secara pasti apa yang dibahas dan disampaikan oleh kedua belah pihak. Pada pertemuan itu, Jokowi didampingi Menteri Luar Negeri Retno Marsudi, Menko Perekonomian Airlangga Hartarto, Menteri Perdagangan Agus Suparmanto, dan Mensesneg Pratikno.Sebelumnya Ross sempat membeberkan di acara Indo-Pacific Business Forum, Bangkok pekan lalu. Maksud kedatangannya ke Indonesia merupakan bagian dari misi dagang AS ke sejumlah negara Indo-Pasifik.Pihak Indonesia dan AS sendiri sejauh ini masih mendiskusikan dan mengevaluasi untuk mendapatkan kesepakatan yang saling menguntungkan. Simak Video "Jokowi Sapa Surya Paloh: Wajahnya Cerah Setelah Rangkul Presiden PKS"[Gambas:Video 20detik](hek/ara)
text:
Green Batik, US Trade Minister Meets Jokowi at the Palace
Nov 6 2019, 10:14 by Hendra Kusuma


Photo: Hendra Kusuma

Jakarta - US Trade Minister Wilbur Ross is now meeting President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) at the Merdeka Palace, Central Jakarta. The meeting took place at 16:31 WIB. Monitoring AFP, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019), Wilbur Ross arrived at the South Jakarta Presidential Palace complex at 16.20 WIB. He was accompanied by the US Ambassador to Indonesia Joseph Donovan who wore a red shirt. Previously, in a meeting between the Coordinating Minister for Economic Affairs Airlangga Hartarto and Wilbur Ross, there were some discussed about Generalized System of Preferences (GSP) affairs, investment, and Indonesian trade relations -AS.GSP is a preferential tariff system that allows one country to officially make exceptions to the general rules of the World Trade Organization (WTO). However, at a meeting with Jokowi it is not yet known exactly what was discussed and delivered by both parties. At the meeting, Jokowi was accompanied by Minister of Foreign Affairs Retno Marsudi, Coordinating Minister for the Economy Airlangga Hartarto, Minister of Trade Agus Suparmanto, and State Secretary Pratikno. Previously Ross had revealed at the Indo-Pacific Business Forum, Bangkok last week. The purpose of his visit to Indonesia is part of the US trade mission to a number of Indo-Pacific countries. The Indonesian and US sides themselves are still discussing and evaluating to get mutually beneficial agreements. Check out the video "Jokowi Greeting Surya Paloh: Bright Face After Embracing the President of PKS" [Gambas: Video 20second] (hek / fig)
